hero.description: I'm a software developer specializing in web applications, testing, and DevOps. I help businesses turn ideas into reliable, scalable software solutions.

about.description1: Hi, I'm Igor - a software developer with a passion for building reliable, well-tested applications. I started DevLogic to offer direct, no-nonsense development services to businesses that need quality software without the agency overhead.
about.description2: When you work with me, you get direct communication, transparent pricing, and a partner who genuinely cares about delivering software that works. No layers of management, no surprises - just focused, quality development.
